description: The Asociación de Escuelas Agroecológicas Sostenibles de San Rafael (ASEAS) focuses on empowering families through agroecological education and practices. Established in 1998, ASEAS aims to promote healthy food production while fostering community collaboration. With 56 member families, the initiative emphasizes sustainable agriculture, environmental awareness, and the importance of local food systems. Through partnerships with various organizations, ASEAS provides training and resources to enhance the livelihoods of small producers in the region.
name: Escuela de Semillas
